doc.field: Mary du': "John! Sǫ' ogn, sǫ' ts'ät ǫttheel, ogn hutnatl'ät."
Mary du': "John! Sǫ' ogn, sǫ' ts'ät ǫttheel, ogn hutnatl'ät."
Mary [said]: "John! Don't [go] outside, don't chop wood, it's dark out."
